songs.title: Badonk

I-95 we be swerving with no fucking purpose
She riding my wave like the young man was surfing
The same hoe that you was instagram lurking
The same hoe I get to put the work with
The same bitch you've been thinkin' 'bout
The same bitch with my dick stuck up in the mouth
Yuh
